edu.ncsu.csc.Galant.gui.editor

Class GAlgorithmSyntaxHighlighting

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc.Galant.gui.editor.GAlgorithmSyntaxHighlighting
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class GAlgorithmSyntaxHighlighting
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Adds syntax highlighting in the algorithm editor. Tooltips are displayed for highlighted API references in the editor.
    Author:
    Jason Cockrell, Ty Devries, Alex McCabe, Michael Owoc
